price: They will have there whatever they wish for, abiding therein forever. That is a promise that your Lord has taken upon Himself.”
arabic: لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَٰلِدِينَۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعۡدٗا مَّسۡـُٔولٗا
